vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ch.29.12;
son of: Amasai (H6022J)
§ Mahath = "grasping"
1) a Kohathite Levite of the house of Korah
2) a Kohathite Levite in the reign of king Hezekiah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a) אֲחִימוֹת   hijo de Amasai; ancestro de Hemán; tribu de Leví; (b)   hijo de Amasai; tribu de Leví; en tiempos de Ezequías; (c)   hombre; tribu de Leví; en tiempos de Ezequías
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
瑪哈 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "握住"
1) 哥轄家的利未人 (代上 6:35; 代下29:12)
2) 希西家時代,哥轄家的利未人 (代下 31:13)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
玛哈 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "握住"
1) 哥辖家的利未人 (代上 6:35; 代下29:12)
2) 希西家时代,哥辖家的利未人 (代下 31:13)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ch.31.13
§ Mahath = "grasping"
1) a Kohathite Levite of the house of Korah
2) a Kohathite Levite in the reign of king Hezekiah

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.6.25;
son of: Amasai (H6022);
father of: Elkanah (H0511J); also called Mahath at 1Ch.6.35;
Another name of a.chi.mot (אֲחִימוֹת "Ahimoth" H0287)
§ Mahath = "grasping"
1) a Kohathite Levite of the house of Korah
2) a Kohathite Levite in the reign of king Hezekiah
